scripts.dev:api:prod:docker: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile prod up -d backend-prod
scripts.dev:api:prod:docker:logs: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile prod logs -f backend-prod
scripts.dev:api:prod:docker:down: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile prod stop backend-prod
scripts.dev:front:prod:docker: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile prod up -d frontend-prod
scripts.dev:front:prod:docker:down: docker compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml --profile prod stop frontend-prod
scripts.qa:precommit: npm -w backend run lint && npm -w backend run lint:types && npm -w frontend run lint && npm -w frontend run typecheck
scripts.qa:prepush: npm -w backend run test && npm -w frontend run test
